original_title: the eyes empty and the pupils burning with rage and desire
overview: Expanded cinema performance with two modified 16mm-projectors that reduce the essence of film and projection to the bare minimum: no image, sound or narrative. From frame to frame, the filmmaker balances on the edge in an improvisation comprised of light, dark and focus, with the film emulsion at a constant boiling point.
title: the eyes empty and the pupils burning with rage and desire
